data.title: The Sensitive Novelist Whose Grandfather Was a Nazi Criminal
data.meta_description: Benedict Wells Became a Successful German Author Well Before Word Got Out That His Granddad Led the Hitler Youth. He Tells Haaretz About Another Odd Influence: Growing Up at Boarding School
